original_title: Germany’s Merz facing opposition over Ukraine troop plan – Bild — RT World News
article_summary: US President Donald Trump has received an invitation to visit Moscow from Russian President Vladimir Putin, following their meeting in Alaska last week. The leaders discussed ways to resolve the Ukraine conflict and normalize relations between Moscow and Washington. Trump also announced plans to arrange a meeting between Putin and Ukraine's Vladimir Zelensky, followed by a trilateral summit.</s>
